title: Commission Operations Management
description: Established comprehensive public meeting coordination system for the NYS Community Commission on Reparation Remedies, ensuring compliance with Open Meetings Law while managing a $5M budget.

title: NYC Schools Therapy Services Optimization
description: Led operational transformation at Omega Care Solutions that increased compliance rates to over 80% within the first year while streamlining service delivery processes for NYC public schools.

title: CUNY Interprofessional Education Program
description: Coordinated university-wide Interprofessional Education initiatives across the CUNY system, enhancing communication platforms and stakeholder engagement for improved academic program oversight.

title: ASAP Student Support Enhancement
description: Developed communication plans and procedural guides that improved service delivery for 2,500+ students in the Accelerated Study in Associate Programs at CUNY Bronx Community College.
